select USER_ID from dimission where USER_ID like '%'||#{prefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' order by USER_ID asc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into dimission
USER_ID,

where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
